ticket.description:
This $49 extra charge is ONLY for the one-year USCF Adult Membership (age 25 thru 64) dues-- it does NOT also include the tournament entry fee! This 449 does NOT also include the Marshall Chess Club membership dues!
All players in any USCF-rated tournament are required to be current USCF members in order to participate.
ticket.name: USCF Adult Membership Dues ** DOES NOT INCLUDE MARSHALL CHESS CLUB MEMBERSHIP!!! ** DOES NOT INCLUDE ENTRY FEE TO TOURNAMENT! **

ticket.description: This $32 extra charge is only for the one-year Premium USCF Young Adult Membership (age 24/below) dues-- does NOT include Marshall Chess Clubl Membership dues and does NOT also include the tournament entry fee!
ticket.name: USCF Premium Young Adult Membership ** DOES NOT INCLUDE MARSHALL CHESS CLUB MEMBERSHIP!!! -- (age 24/below): includes 12 monthly issues of Chess Life magazine
